summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent in the early hours of May 14, 2010. The email contains a brief message inquiring about a potential hack, and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the communication may be privileged and confidential.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a direct communication with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on May 14, 2010.
The subject of the email is a question about a potential hack.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
